channel.title: Hellz Scape Client v1 ip help
channel.description: I've been trying to change my hellz scape client IP Address connection, but when I change it, and I compile, it still says connecting to 127.0.0.1. How do I succesfully change the client.java so it will connect?

item.title: Hellz Scape Client v1 ip help
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

It is not only in the client class, but also try the EGUI class.

Read full topic
item.source: Hellz Scape Client v1 ip help
